snippet.title: Deflector | Date Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Switch | Xbox One Series X|S
snippet.description:
Annihilate or get annihilated. Face the virus and don’t let it take control over the world. Deflector is a hack and slash, where you experience a dynamic gameplay with an unlimited and unique combo system. Test your reflex and don’t let your guard down – enemies will have no mercy. 

Don't forget to follow us on 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/RedDeer_Games
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/RedDeerGames
and Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/reddeer_games/
